Title: Bleach
Writer: Tite Kubo (manga), Shinsuke Sato (screenplay), Daisuke Habara (screenplay)
Actors: Sôta Fukushi, Hana Sugisaki, Ryô Yoshizawa, Erina Mano
Plot: A Japanese teenager can see ghosts and sees a cute girl fighting an evil monster. He ends up with her reaper power and she as human in his high school class. He discovers a connection between his mom's death and these monsters.
